info.name: Google Nav Goes on a Diet - 2011 Q4
info.description:
The Google nav bar area keeps getting chubbier and more colorful. Trim it down and reduce the amount of distracting color and brightness changes

+ Trim down header height
+ Reduce service description text size and change to muted color
info.additionalInfo: * 2012.03.06 : fix appbar line through top of search results
